mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, age, graduate_school, degree, graduate_time FROM pms_horsen.staff
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pms_horsen.staff(name, age, graduate_school, degree, graduate_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{age}, #{graduateSchool}, #{degree}, #{graduateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE pms_horsen.staff SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
